sentences.english: Ba Gua's basics are standing and walking in eight palace.

sentences.english: The basic functions of the head-box of papermachine are described in this paper.

sentences.english: The other articles in this site will go into each of these in more detail.

sentences.english: This fundamental is about being able to do it.

sentences.english: Eighth, to see whether a person solid basic skills, but also the ability of its rotation.

sentences.english: The basic function of a reference electrode is to maintain a constant electrical potential .

sentences.english: The basic function of the Cantonese final particles is assisting the intonation to convey moods.

sentences.english: Met-L-Tec considers the setup and electroforming process as the primary function over fabrication.

sentences.english: In other words, the essential purpose of language use is to communicate.
